title: Can You Download Disney Plus Movies on a Laptop?

steps.title: You cannot download Disney Plus content on a laptop.
steps.content: You cannot download Disney Plus content on a laptop. There are many ways to watch Disney+, you can only download shows and movies if you're using the mobile app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. You cannot use the Disney+ website or desktop app on your laptop to download movies for offline viewing. Note that offline viewing via a mobile device is only available to Disney+ Premium , Disney Bundle Trio Premium , and Legacy Disney Bundle subscribers. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Avoid third-party sites that claim to download Disney+ shows/movies.
steps.content: Avoid third-party sites that claim to download Disney+ shows/movies. Some third-party sites claim to offer a workaround for downloading content to your laptop. However, we've tested these products, and none work as described. The only way to watch Disney Plus offline is to download movies and shows to your mobile device via the Disney+ app.
